nodes.text: Aguarl 3 was a water planet located in the Aguarl system of the Expansion Region.

With the rise of the Galactic Empire, the planet pledged support to the Imperial Senate, but peace was not to last on Aguarl. After the first Imperial attack on Dac, a number of Mon Calamari and Quarren Rebels established a base on the world. Princess Leia Organa of the Alliance to Restore the Republic was preparing to leave Kalla's Stanchion to visit Aguarl 3 to meet with Prime Minister Yenley approximately six months after the Battle of Yavin, but was delayed by a sighting of Imperial forces which forced the rebels to scatter their fleet temporarily.

Later the same month, Organa was inspecting the Rebel base on the planet when a Quarren spy betrayed its location to the Empire. Four TIE bombers from the Ravagor attacked the planet, but only one survived the defense system, piloted by Ranulf Trommer. Trommer's concussion missiles necessitated the evacuation of the Rebel base.
